title: Poslah Run Commands Executor
description: Runs a sequence of shell commands.

commands.description: An array of commands to execute in sequence.

oneOf.description: A command to run in the shell.

args.description: Arguments to pass to the command.

stopOnFail.description: If true, stops executing commands after the first one fails.

cwd.description: The working directory to run commands from. Will be created if it doesn't exist.

printTiming.description: If true, prints the execution time of each command.
